title: Ursula von der Leyen, one of the most powerful women in Europe, says she still faces sexism
content:
1. Ursula von der Leyen, one of the most powerful women in Europe, says she still faces sexism  The Washington Post
  2. The E.U. May Reopen to Vaccinated American Tourists. Here's What to Know.  The New York Times
  3. Europe to open doors to vaccinated Americans  Reuters
  4. We need a vaccine-patent waiver. Why is the EU blocking it?  EUobserver
  5. Fully vaccinated Americans will be able to vacation in the EU this summer, European Commission president tells New York Times  CNN

localize.title: 欧州で最もパワフルな女性の一人であるUrsula von der Leyen氏は、未だに性差別に直面していると語っています。
